items.name: Alex Chen
items.content: HostChicken made setting up my server so easy. Within minutes, I had a fully configured Minecraft server running smoothly.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: The performance is incredible. Our server handles 100+ players without any lag. Support is always there when needed.

items.name: Mike Rodriguez
items.content: Finally found a hosting service that understands competitive gaming. Low ping and reliable uptime every time.

deployment.question: How quickly can I get my server running?
deployment.answer: Most servers are deployed within 30 seconds of payment confirmation. You'll receive login details immediately.

upgrade.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?
upgrade.answer: Yes! You can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, downgrades at the next billing cycle.

games.question: What games do you support?
games.answer: We support all major games including Minecraft, Rust, ARK, Counter-Strike, Team Fortress 2, and many more.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact support for a full refund.

cta.subtitle: Join thousands of gamers who have already made the switch. Your perfect server is just one click away.
